snippet: One of the best performances on "American Idol" this week came when Joshua Ledet and Jessica Sanchez, two of the top contenders for the finals, teamed up.
abstract: One of the best performances on "American Idol" this week came when Joshua Ledet and Jessica Sanchez, two of the top contenders for the finals, teamed up.

headline.main: On 'Idol,' a Duet From Two Top Contenders
